name: Kalmar Southern Agricultural Society Award
obverse: A woman in a robe stands with a spear in her right hand and a bundle of wheat in her left hand. Behind the woman are agricultural instruments.
obverse_inscriptions: AF CALMAR LÄNS SÖDRA HUSHÅLLNINGS SÄLLSKAP.
reverse: A wreath encloses a blank space. Pearls surround the edge of the reverse.
description: This medal was made as an award medal for the Kalmar Southern Agricultural Society.
This medal has a hole at the top probably to allow it to be worn as a necklace.
